name: Express Gift
description: The Astral Express has visited countless worlds and made many reliable companions along the way. The Express Crew invites friends, old and new, to fight alongside the Trailblazers. Wishing you a bright future on your trailblazing expedition.
introduction:
◆ Event Rewards ◆
During the event, when you log in to the game, you can choose one of the following 5-star characters:
"Himeko," "Welt," "Bronya," "Gepard," "Clara," "Yanqing," "Bailu."
